resource.description: Reference to the preassigned work center.

source.description: Full path to the source, including the server hostname.

relativePath.description: Relative path from the source to get the details of the object, including the ID of the object.

operationOcc.description: Occurrence path for the related process operation.

instancePosition.description:
Its Position of the instance in the occurrence path relative to reference item and this is not stored in database it just a temporary value to match the input and output.
'instancePosition' was additionally introduced because even if ordering Instances in specifiedOccurrence array was randomized for some reason (because of sorting or so ..) we process it in the right way.

source.description: Full path to the source, including the server hostname.

relativePath.description: Relative path from the source to get the details of the object, including the ID of the object.
